          taur(k,NS21+j) = tauray

4787

4788

    
    

    

    


    

    
4789

    ✓✓
    
1797705

    
      do k = 1, laytrop

    


    

    
4790

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        speccomb = colamt(k,1) + strrat(21)*colamt(k,2)

    


    

    
4791

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        specmult = 8.0 * min(oneminus, colamt(k,1) / speccomb)

    


    

    
4792

    
    

    

    


    

    
4793

    
    
1769170

    
        js = 1 + int(specmult)

    


    

    
4794

    
    
1769170

    
        fs = mod(specmult, f_one)

    


    

    
4795

    
    
1769170

    
        fs1= f_one - fs

    


    

    
4796

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac000 = fs1 * fac00(k)

    


    

    
4797

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac010 = fs1 * fac10(k)

    


    

    
4798

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac100 = fs  * fac00(k)

    


    

    
4799

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac110 = fs  * fac10(k)

    


    

    
4800

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac001 = fs1 * fac01(k)

    


    

    
4801

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac011 = fs1 * fac11(k)

    


    

    
4802

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac101 = fs  * fac01(k)

    


    

    
4803

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac111 = fs  * fac11(k)

    


    

    
4804

    
    

    

    


    

    
4805

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        ind01 = id0(k,21) + js

    


    

    
4806

    
    
1769170

    
        ind02 = ind01 + 1

    


    

    
4807

    
    
1769170

    
        ind03 = ind01 + 9

    


    

    
4808

    
    
1769170

1769170

    
        inds = indself(k)

    


    

    
4815

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        indf = indfor (k)

    


    

    
4816

    ✓✓

        do j = 1, NG21

    ✗✓✗✓

!> The subroutine computes the optical depth in band 22:  7700-8050

      subroutine taumol22

    


    

    
4880

    
    

    
!...................................

    


    

    
4881

    
    

    

    


    

    
4882

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
4883

    
    

    
!     band 22:  7700-8050 cm-1 (low - h2o,o2; high - o2)               !

    


    

    
4884

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
4885

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
4886

    
    

    
      use module_radsw_kgb22

    


    

    
4887

    
    

    

    


    

    
4888

    
    

    
!  ---  locals:

    


    

    
4889

    
    
28535

    
      real (kind=kind_phys) :: speccomb, specmult, tauray, fs, fs1,     &

    


    

    
4890

    
    
28535

    
     &       fac000,fac001,fac010,fac011, fac100,fac101,fac110,fac111,  &

    


    

    
4891

    
    
28535

    
     &       o2adj, o2cont, o2tem

    


    

    
4892

    
    

    

    


    

    
4893

    
    
28535

    
      integer :: ind01, ind02, ind03, ind04, ind11, ind12, ind13, ind14

    


    

    
4894

    
    
28535

    
      integer :: inds, indf, indsp, indfp, j, js, k

    


    

    
4895

    
    

    

    


    

    
4896

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
4897

    
    

    
!===> ... begin here

    


    

    
4898

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
4899

    
    

    
!  --- ...  the following factor is the ratio of total o2 band intensity (lines

    


    

    
4900

    
    

    
!           and mate continuum) to o2 band intensity (line only). it is needed

    


    

    
4901

    
    

    
!           to adjust the optical depths since the k's include only lines.

    


    

    
4902

    
    

    

    


    

    
4903

    
    
28535

    
      o2adj = 1.6

    


    

    
4904

    
    
28535

    
      o2tem = 4.35e-4 / (350.0*2.0)

    


    

    
4905

    
    

    

    


    

    
4906

    
    

    

    


    

    
4907

    
    

    
!  --- ...  compute the optical depth by interpolating in ln(pressure),

    


    

    
4908

    
    

    
!           temperature, and appropriate species.  below laytrop, the water

    


    

    
4909

    
    

    
!           vapor self-continuum is interpolated (in temperature) separately.

    


    

    
4910

    
    

    

    


    

    
4911

    ✓✓
    
2282800

    
      do k = 1, nlay

    


    

    
4912

    ✗✓✗✓

    
2254265

    
        tauray = colmol(k) * rayl

    


    

    
4913

    
    

    

    


    

    
4914

    ✓✓
    
6791330

    
        do j = 1, NG22

    


    

    
4915

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
6762795

    
          taur(k,NS22+j) = tauray

    


    

    
4916

    
    

    
        enddo

    


    

    
4917

    
    

    
      enddo

    


    

    
4918

    
    

    

    


    

    
4919

    ✓✓
    
1797705

    
      do k = 1, laytrop

    


    

    
4920

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        o2cont   = o2tem * colamt(k,6)

    


    

    
4921

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        speccomb = colamt(k,1) + strrat(22)*colamt(k,6)

    


    

    
4922

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        specmult = 8.0 * min(oneminus, colamt(k,1) / speccomb)

    


    

    
4923

    
    

    

    


    

    
4924

    
    
1769170

    
        js = 1 + int(specmult)

    


    

    
4925

    
    
1769170

    
        fs = mod(specmult, f_one)

    


    

    
4926

    
    
1769170

    
        fs1= f_one - fs

    


    

    
4927

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac000 = fs1 * fac00(k)

    


    

    
4928

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac010 = fs1 * fac10(k)

    


    

    
4929

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac100 = fs  * fac00(k)

    


    

    
4930

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac110 = fs  * fac10(k)

    


    

    
4931

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac001 = fs1 * fac01(k)

    


    

    
4932

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac011 = fs1 * fac11(k)

    


    

    
4933

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac101 = fs  * fac01(k)

    


    

    
4934

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac111 = fs  * fac11(k)

    


    

    
4935

    
    

    

    


    

    
4936

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        ind01 = id0(k,22) + js

    


    

    
4937

    
    
1769170

    
        ind02 = ind01 + 1

    


    

    
4938

    
    
1769170

    
        ind03 = ind01 + 9

    


    

    
4939

    
    
1769170

    
        ind04 = ind01 + 10

    


    

    
4940

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        ind11 = id1(k,22) + js

    


    

    
4941

    
    
1769170

    
        ind12 = ind11 + 1

    


    

    
4942

    
    
1769170

    
        ind13 = ind11 + 9

    


    

    
4943

    
    
1769170

    
        ind14 = ind11 + 10

    


    

    
4944

    
    

    

    


    

    
4945

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        inds = indself(k)

    


    

    
4946

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        indf = indfor (k)

    


    

    
4947

    
    
1769170

    
        indsp= inds + 1

    


    

    
4948

    
    
1769170

    
        indfp= indf + 1

    


    

    
4949

    
    

    

    


    

    
4950

    ✓✓
    
5336045

    
        do j = 1, NG22

    


    

    
4951

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓		
    
3538340

    
          taug(k,NS22+j) = speccomb                                     &

    


    

    
4952

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
3538340

    
     &        * ( fac000 * absa(ind01,j) + fac100 * absa(ind02,j)       &

    


    

    
4953

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

4960

5051

    
    
28535

    
      subroutine taumol24

    


    

    
5052

    
    

    
!...................................

    


    

    
5053

    
    

    

    


    

    
5054

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
5055

5056

5058

    
    

    
      use module_radsw_kgb24

    


    

    
5059

    
    

    

    


    

    
5060

    
    

    
!  ---  locals:

    


    

    
5061

    
    
28535

    
      real (kind=kind_phys) :: speccomb, specmult, fs, fs1,             &

    


    

    
5062

    
    
28535

    
     &       fac000,fac001,fac010,fac011, fac100,fac101,fac110,fac111

    


    

    
5063

    
    

    

    


    

    
5064

    
    
28535

    
      integer :: ind01, ind02, ind03, ind04, ind11, ind12, ind13, ind14

    


    

    
5065

    
    
28535

    
      integer :: inds, indf, indsp, indfp, j, js, k

    


    

    
5066

    
    

    

    


    

    
5067

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
5068

    
    

    
!===> ... begin here

    


    

    
5069

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
5070

    
    

    

    


    

    
5071

    
    

    
!  --- ...  compute the optical depth by interpolating in ln(pressure),

    


    

    
5072

    
    

    
!           temperature, and appropriate species.  below laytrop, the water

    


    

    
5073

    
    

    
!           vapor self-continuum is interpolated (in temperature) separately.

    


    

    
5074

    
    

    

    


    

    
5075

    ✓✓
    
1797705

    
      do k = 1, laytrop

    


    

    
5076

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        speccomb = colamt(k,1) + strrat(24)*colamt(k,6)

    


    

    
5077

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        specmult = 8.0 * min(oneminus, colamt(k,1) / speccomb)

    


    

    
5078

    
    

    

    


    

    
5079

    
    
1769170

    
        js = 1 + int(specmult)

    


    

    
5080

    
    
1769170

    
        fs = mod(specmult, f_one)

    


    

    
5081

    
    
1769170

    
        fs1= f_one - fs

    


    

    
5082

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac000 = fs1 * fac00(k)

    


    

    
5083

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac010 = fs1 * fac10(k)

    


    

    
5084

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac100 = fs  * fac00(k)

    


    

    
5085

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac110 = fs  * fac10(k)

    


    

    
5086

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac001 = fs1 * fac01(k)

    


    

    
5087

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac011 = fs1 * fac11(k)

    


    

    
5088

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac101 = fs  * fac01(k)

    


    

    
5089

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac111 = fs  * fac11(k)

    


    

    
5090

    
    

    

    


    

    
5091

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        ind01 = id0(k,24) + js

    


    

    
5092

    
    
1769170

    
        ind02 = ind01 + 1

    


    

    
5093

    
    
1769170

    
        ind03 = ind01 + 9

    


    

    
5094

    
    
1769170

    
        ind04 = ind01 + 10

    


    

    
5095

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        ind11 = id1(k,24) + js

    


    

    
5096

    
    
1769170

    
        ind12 = ind11 + 1

    


    

    
5097

    
    
1769170

    
        ind13 = ind11 + 9

    


    

    
5098

    
    
1769170

    
        ind14 = ind11 + 10

    


    

    
5099

    
    

    

    


    

    
5100

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        inds = indself(k)

    


    

    
5101

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        indf = indfor (k)

    


    

    
5102

    
    
1769170

    
        indsp= inds + 1

    


    

    
5103

    
    
1769170

    
        indfp= indf + 1

    


    

    
5104

    
    

    

    


    

    
5105

    ✓✓

        do j = 1, NG24

    ✗✓✗✓

!> The subroutine computes the optical depth in band 25:  16000-22650

    


    

    
5145

!! cm-1 (low - o3,o2; high - o3,o2)

    


    

    
5300

    
    

    
!-----------------------------------

    


    

    
5301

    
    
28535

    
      subroutine taumol28

    


    

    
5302

    
    

    
!...................................

    


    

    
5303

    
    

    

    


    

    
5304

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
5305

    
    

    
!     band 28:  38000-50000 cm-1 (low - o3,o2; high - o3,o2)           !

    


    

    
5306

    
    

    
!  ------------------------------------------------------------------  !

    


    

    
5307

5308

    
    

    
      use module_radsw_kgb28

    


    

    
5309

    
    

    

    


    

    
5310

    
    

    
!  ---  locals:

    


    

    
5311

    
    
28535

    
      real (kind=kind_phys) :: speccomb, specmult, tauray, fs, fs1,     &

    


    

    
5312

    
    
28535

    
     &       fac000,fac001,fac010,fac011, fac100,fac101,fac110,fac111

    


    

    
5313

    
    

    

    


    

    
5314

    
    
28535

    
      integer :: ind01, ind02, ind03, ind04, ind11, ind12, ind13, ind14

    


    

    
5315

    
    
28535

    
      integer :: j, js, k

    


    

    
5316

    
    

    

    


    

    
5317

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
5318

    
    

    
!===> ... begin here

    


    

    
5319

    
    

    
!

    


    

    
5320

    
    

    

    


    

    
5321

    
    

    
!  --- ...  compute the optical depth by interpolating in ln(pressure),

    


    

    
5322

    
    

    
!           temperature, and appropriate species.  below laytrop, the water

    


    

    
5323

    
    

    
!           vapor self-continuum is interpolated (in temperature) separately.

    


    

    
5324

    
    

    

    


    

    
5325

    ✓✓
    
2282800

    
      do k = 1, nlay

    


    

    
5326

    ✗✓✗✓

    
2254265

    
        tauray = colmol(k) * rayl

    


    

    
5327

    
    

    

    


    

    
5328

    ✓✓
    
15808390

    
        do j = 1, NG28

    


    

    
5329

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
15779855

    
          taur(k,NS28+j) = tauray

    


    

    
5330

    
    

    
        enddo

    


    

    
5331

    
    

    
      enddo

    


    

    
5332

    
    

    

    


    

    
5333

    ✓✓
    
1797705

    
      do k = 1, laytrop

    


    

    
5334

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        speccomb = colamt(k,3) + strrat(28)*colamt(k,6)

    


    

    
5335

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        specmult = 8.0 * min(oneminus, colamt(k,3) / speccomb)

    


    

    
5336

    
    

    

    


    

    
5337

    
    
1769170

    
        js = 1 + int(specmult)

    


    

    
5338

    
    
1769170

    
        fs = mod(specmult, f_one)

    


    

    
5339

    
    
1769170

    
        fs1= f_one - fs

    


    

    
5340

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac000 = fs1 * fac00(k)

    


    

    
5341

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac010 = fs1 * fac10(k)

    


    

    
5342

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac100 = fs  * fac00(k)

    


    

    
5343

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac110 = fs  * fac10(k)

    


    

    
5344

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac001 = fs1 * fac01(k)

    


    

    
5345

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac011 = fs1 * fac11(k)

    


    

    
5346

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac101 = fs  * fac01(k)

    


    

    
5347

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        fac111 = fs  * fac11(k)

    


    

    
5348

    
    

    

    


    

    
5349

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        ind01 = id0(k,28) + js

    


    

    
5350

    
    
1769170

    
        ind02 = ind01 + 1

    


    

    
5351

    
    
1769170

    
        ind03 = ind01 + 9

    


    

    
5352

    
    
1769170

    
        ind04 = ind01 + 10

    


    

    
5353

    ✗✓✗✓

    
1769170

    
        ind11 = id1(k,28) + js

    


    

    
5354

    
    
1769170

    
        ind12 = ind11 + 1

    


    

    
5355

    
    
1769170

    
        ind13 = ind11 + 9

    


    

    
5356

    
    
1769170

    
        ind14 = ind11 + 10

    


    

    
5357

    
    

    

    


    

    
5358

    ✓✓
    
12412725

    
        do j = 1, NG28

    


    

    
5359

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓		
    
10615020

    
          taug(k,NS28+j) = speccomb                                     &

    


    

    
5360

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
10615020

    
     &        * ( fac000 * absa(ind01,j) + fac100 * absa(ind02,j)       &

    


    

    
5361

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
10615020

    
     &        +   fac010 * absa(ind03,j) + fac110 * absa(ind04,j)       &

    


    

    
5362

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
10615020

    
     &        +   fac001 * absa(ind11,j) + fac101 * absa(ind12,j)       &

    


    

    
5363

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓
✗✓		
    
22999210

    
     &        +   fac011 * absa(ind13,j) + fac111 * absa(ind14,j) )

    


    

    
5364

    
    

    
        enddo

    


    

    
5365

    
    

    
      enddo

    


    

    
5366

    
    

    

    


    

    
5367

    ✓✓
    
513630

    
      do k = laytrop+1, nlay

    


    

    
5368

    ✗✓✗✓
✗✓✗✓

    
485095

    
        speccomb = colamt(k,3) + strrat(28)*colamt(k,6)

    


    

    
5369

    ✗✓✗✓

    
485095

    
        specmult = 4.0 * min(oneminus, colamt(k,3) / speccomb)

    


    

    
5370

    
    

    

    


    

    
5371

    
    
485095

    
        js = 1 + int(specmult)

    


    

    
5372

    
    
485095

    
        fs = mod(specmult, f_one)

    


    

    
5373

    
    
485095

    
        fs1= f_one - fs

    


    

    
5374

    ✗✓✗✓

    
485095

    
        fac000 = fs1 * fac00(k)

    


    

    
5375

    ✗✓✗✓

    
485095

    
        fac010 = fs1 * fac10(k)

    


    

    
5376

    ✗✓✗✓

    
485095

    
        fac100 = fs  * fac00(k)

    


    

    
5377

    ✗✓✗✓

    
485095

    
        fac110 = fs  * fac10(k)

    


    

    
5378

    ✗✓✗✓

    
485095

    
        fac001 = fs1 * fac01(k)

    


    

    
5379

    ✗✓✗✓

    
485095
